author: essence misses omar already🥺
text: being a part of the LGBTQIA+ community means being there for OUR ENTIRE COMMUNITY! not just lesbians supporting lesbians and gay men supporting gay men, WE NEED FLUIDITY WITHIN THE LGBTQIA+ COMMUNITY! WE NEED TO SUPPORT EACH OTHER! INCLUDING OUR NON-BINARY AND TRANS FAMILY!!

author: essence misses omar already🥺
text: lord knows they deserve allll the love and joy and empathy and RESPECT and just flat out decency that this ugly world has to offer them, and lord knows I will be there to dose out as much of my love, joy, empathy, respect and decency to as many beautiful trans people as i can <3

author: essence misses omar already🥺
text: the entire movement of hatred towards trans people has made me frustrated and i know like others, I too could be doing better. I know my silly little twitter thread won’t change cyberbullying but, i hope that one day there is a time where trans people can finally live in peace.

author: essence misses omar already🥺
text: the lack of support and empathy for the trans community is massively disappointing and quite literally disgusting! the fact that people want to live THEIR honest truth FREELY, somehow makes it okay for you to harass someone online? the thought process makes no sense to me..

author: essence misses omar already🥺
text: this is a problem! how can someone be massively invalidated by his alleged “fans” and people who just LOOOVE to comment on other people’s gender, to the point where he has now been made to feel the only way any harassment his way will stop is if he doesn’t use they/them prns?

author: essence misses omar already🥺
text: so pls go to that show you’ve been dying to go to, plan safe and honestly you’ll see how enjoyable it is to take yourself out on a date! solo concerts can be such a fun experience, just allow yourself to be free and bask in the artist u love!❤️❤️❤️❤️

author: essence misses omar already🥺
text: but last night at omar’s show, i felt 100% free to be myself and to just let loose and have fun. no judgement. i’m not gonna make fun of myself because of how much i love an artist, others can look or make dirty faces but i had a great time regardless!

author: essence misses omar already🥺
text: i have gone to a many concerts in the past but ALWAYS with someone so when i stopped going to shows with them, i just stopped going altogether but in 2018 moving to a different city honestly opened my mind and made me go to a show alone!

author: essence misses omar already🥺
text: plan smart of course but don’t keep yourself from a good time because you have to go alone. i have been to two shows alone and last night was a great definition of me finally learning to do things by myself.

author: essence misses omar already🥺
text: i cannot stress this enough but if there is an artist u love and u want to see them live but don’t know anyone who will with you or you maybe you just don’t have anyone to go with but and i mean this…GO ANYWAYS!
